name: Peer
description:
“Peer” is a short rpg maker vx ace horror experience that acts or uses point and click like mechanics, akin to adventure games, to continue or progress throughout the game, and is heavily story based, revolving around the story of an unnamed protagonist as they simply navigate their home, in suit of slumber.

Headphones are recommended

Any feedback relating to "Peer" is much appreciated, that said, please remember to support contributors to the project as well, which are located or seen within the "Read Me" file provided with the download.

Enjoy.
